thread.title: BG Staffing posts 2Q profit

title: BG Staffing posts 2Q profit
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 14:05 BST - UK Markets close in 2 hrs 25 mins BG Staffing posts 2Q profit BG Staffing posts 2nd-quarter profit of $1.5 million Associated Press – 4 minutes 21 seconds ago 
PLANO, Texas (AP) _ BG Staffing Inc. (BGSF) on Monday reported second-quarter net income of $1.5 million. 
The Plano, Texas-based company said it had profit of 20 cents per share. 
The staffing company posted revenue of $49.8 million in the period. 
BG Staffing shares have fallen nearly 8 percent since the beginning of the year. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on BGSF at http://www.zacks.com/ap/BGSF
